item.title: About me
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: Hi! My name is Jason Krol and I’ve been programming for over 20 years! I absolutely love the feeling of solving something challenging I experience “programmers high” daily I love… my wife and son running movies reading video games Currently I am… Building the Boomerang.com OTT apps using Angular (Component Driven Architecture FTW!) Playing PSVR Painting miniatures Doing yard work ;) Favorites… Movies: Aliens Big Trouble in Little China Heat (1995) Die Hard Jurassic Park Terminator 2 The Abyss Legend (1985) Fifth Element Warrior Video Games: Bayonetta Ninja Gaiden 1 & 2 (Xbox) Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Elder Scrolls Oblivion Grand Theft Auto III Super Mario 64 Books: Snowcrash Breach Trilogy Red Rising Trilogy Neuromancer Virtual Light Jurassic Park Music: Crystal Method The Prodigy Chemical Brothers Nine Inch Nails Basically any EDM
